invalid.title: Invalid Password
invalid.description: The current password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

verifyFailed.title: Verification Failed
verifyFailed.description: Failed to verify current password. Please try again.

missing.title: Missing Information
missing.description: Please fill in all password fields.

mismatch.title: Passwords Don't Match
mismatch.description: New passwords don't match. Please try again.

tooShort.title: Password Too Short
tooShort.description: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

same.title: Same Password
same.description: New password must be different from your current password.

profileError.title: Profile Error
profileError.description: Profile data not available. Please try again.

updated.title: Password Changed Successfully
updated.description: Your password has been updated successfully.

updateFailed.title: Password Update Failed
updateFailed.description: Failed to update password. Please try again.
